      • setPenMode

        public void setPenMode(int penMode)
        set pen mode 设置笔的模式,目前支持"数码笔","手指","鼠标","全部"这几种模式
        参数:
        penMode - should be WkPaintView.PEN_MODE.STYLUS ,WkPaintView.PEN_MODE.FINGER ,WkPaintView.PEN_MODE.MOUSE or WkPaintView.PEN_MODE.ALL
        从以下版本开始:
        V1.2, @version
        另请参阅:
        WkPaintView.PEN_MODE.STYLUS, WkPaintView.PEN_MODE.FINGER, WkPaintView.PEN_MODE.MOUSE, WkPaintView.PEN_MODE.ALL
